entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
